name: Brawl at the Beach - A Fighting Game Tournament
blurb: Brawl at the Beach is a fighting game tournament that is quickly becoming one of the most unique events in the United States.

rewards.reward: We will say "Thanks" on our livestream credits at Brawl at the Beach IV with a personal message!
EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. A special SHOUTOUT on our livestream credits.

A BRAWL AT THE BEACH IV POSTER! As an added bonus we\u2019ll AUTOGRAPH it and put a personal message on it just for you! EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. (Please add $5 for international shipping)

An official EASTSIDE GAMING ORGANIZATION T-SHIRT & also a special SHOUTOUT on our livestream credits. EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. (Please add $5 for international shipping)

An official BRAWL AT THE BEACH T-SHIRT & also a special SHOUTOUT on our livestream credits. EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. (Please add $5 for international shipping)

An official EASTSIDE GAMING ORGANIZATION COFFEE CUP & also a special SHOUTOUT on our livestream credits. EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. (Please add $5 for international shipping)

An official EASTSIDE GAMING ORGANIZATION MOUSEPAD & also a special SHOUTOUT on our livestream credits. EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. (Please add $5 for international shipping)

An official ONE-OF-A-KIND digitally drawn BRAWL AT THE BEACH ARTWORK by Artist Kat Cygnus, digitally autographed for the backer. Each piece of artwork will feature different characters, unique art, and also bear the logos of Brawl at the Beach, Eastside Gaming, & Gaming Illuminati for each backer and ARTWORK will be sent in JPEG and PDF format. EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone.

FOR BUSINESS BACKERS: YOUR LOGO ON 50 pictures from Brawl at the Beach IV. Your LOGO will be on completely random images and may be bundled with other logos depending on number of backers. Your Business Logo shown on our Livestream (the livestream will run for up to 12 hours!). EXCLUSIVE desktop WALLPAPER (feat. special shots from our EVENT) for your PC, Mac, mobile tablet or phone. Your business will be on the sponsors page on our website eastsidegaming.com and theohso.com

FOR BUSINESS BACKERS: A 12 SECOND COMMERCIAL/AD/IMAGE on our livestream of your brand/business. This can be a VIDEO or an IMAGE that we will show during our event. If this is an IMAGE, please provide us with more information if enough is not already on the image.

An official ONE-OF-A-KIND hand-painted BRAWL AT THE BEACH SNEAKER by our supporting local artist Dana Zalesky (www.danazalesky.com). Each shoe will feature different characters, unique art and also bear the logos of Brawl at the Beach, Eastside Gaming, & Gaming Illuminati. Pictures will also be included before being shipped. (Please add $15 for international shipping)

A FULLY CUSTOMIZED ONE-OF-A-KIND (ULTIMATE MARVEL VS CAPCOM) NOVA MMA GLOVE that is wearable! It also comes with a clear case for display! An official BRAWL AT THE BEACH T-SHIRT, A BRAWL AT THE BEACH IV POSTER autographed with a personal message just for you, A PERSONAL THANK YOU VIDEO from the organizers. (Please add $15 for international shipping)

A FULLY CUSTOMIZED ONE-OF-A-KIND (KING OF FIGHTERS) MAI SHIRANUI RESIN FIGURINE! It will be constructed, painted and placed in a protective case for display! An official BRAWL AT THE BEACH T-SHIRT, official EASTSIDE GAMING COFFEE MUG, BRAWL AT THE BEACH IV POSTER autographed with a personal message just for you, A PERSONAL THANK YOU VIDEO from the organizers. (Please add $15 for international shipping)

A FULLY CUSTOMIZED ONE-OF-A-KIND (SOUL CALIBUR) TAKI RESIN FIGURINE! It will be constructed, painted and placed in a protective case for display! An official BRAWL AT THE BEACH T-SHIRT, official EASTSIDE GAMING COFFEE MUG, BRAWL AT THE BEACH IV POSTER autographed with a personal message just for you, A PERSONAL THANK YOU VIDEO from the organizers. (Please add $15 for international shipping)

Previous rewards starting at $200 and below + Eastside Gaming Organization will COME TO YOUR TOWN/CITY TO RUN A GAMING TOURNAMENT OF YOUR CHOICE. (United States Only + Delivery date of this will be determined  with the Backer)

Eastside Gaming Organization will COME TO YOUR TOWN/CITY TO RUN A GAMING TOURNAMENT OF YOUR CHOICE! + your choice of A FULLY CUSTOMIZED ONE-OF-A-KIND MAI SHIRANUI or TAKI resin figure. It will be constructed, painted and placed in a protective case for display! (United States Only + Delivery date of this will be determined  with the Backer)
